name: Hyland Hills
description: Hyland Hills is nestled in the Twin Cities suburb of Bloomington, MN—a small but vibrant ski area renowned for its innovative Terrain Parks, SnowSports Academy, and welcoming, family-friendly atmosphere. Open from mid-November through mid-March, Hyland boasts 100% snowmaking coverage, meticulous nightly grooming, and daily night skiing, ensuring a top-tier experience from first chair to last run.
